| Overview                = The '''Warriors of the Deadly Sabre''' are the foot soldiers representing the [[House of the Deadly Sabre]], one of the five Houses of the [[Five Weapons Society (Earth-616)|Five Weapons Society]].  As an homage to the namesake [[Deadly Warriors (Earth-616)|Deadly Warrior]], the Warriors of the Deadly Sabre are dressed in white and utilize bladed weapons.  
| History                 = The Warriors of the Deadly Sabre are present for [[Shang-Chi (Earth-616)|Shang-Chi]]'s ascension to Supreme Commander of the Society and swear fealty to him.{{r|Shang-Chi Vol 1 5}}
